column4: im using a Logitech USB HEADSET. I can hear ok, but it seems my headset microphone doesnt get picked up. What can I do>
not muted.. still no microphone.. surely this is basic needs Ubuntu needs to address :(
it picks up my voice, but when I play back, its delayed, pauses every 1 second in my microphone
Your x-lite settings are wrong.  x-lite is a PITA to configure
x-lite is a PITA to configure in Windows too
no way!! I got x-lite working in Vista in 1 mins
Try listening to people when they give you answers.  You need to configure it properly.
its configured... but it says "firewall blocked...."
/whois me - consider how many times I've configured x-lite.  When I tell you your configuration is wrong, there is a reason for it.
If you would listen to what I am telling you, you can avoid this whole mess.  It is NOT an Ubuntu firewall issue.
why then does it give me messages about firewall block?
You are behind NAT.  I've said this twice now.  I'm done though.
no im not.. I dont have a NAT modem.. in fact Im using a wireless USB stick modem.. NO NAT
ive tried to tell you this twice now
yvonne, who has never used Linux got wireless working in 1/10th the time you've been here.  Think about that.
